concept.title: Analytics Dashboard Overview
concept.shortdesc: The dashboard shows the most valuable metrics that give you insight into the performance of your store and the behavior of your customers. The parameters are shown in numeric format and also as graphs where appropriate. For all the metrics, the percentage change from the previous date range can also be shown. In this section, you will learn the basics of how to view your selling trends.

conbody.p: In the Overview dashboard you can do the following activities:

ul.li: Check the value of your recent sales and compare them to a previous time period
